content: looking for a fun and free pattern to create some funny washcloths in overlay mosaic crochet check out this free chart originally made in august 2022 and shared in my facebook group to thank my lovely members for being there now also available here pattern is 50 stitches wide and 51 row high made with 8/4 cotton results in a perfect washcloth size the file comes with a basic chart and written pattern without extra information about the technique so please make sure you know how to do overlay mosaic crochet when you want to make these lots of tutorials on youtube quotes included the house was clean yesterday sorry you missed it talk dirty to me the only thing i hate more than a dirty home is cleaning cleaning probably won t kill you but why risk it i would rather crochet life is too short to clean
